sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词都有"空的"之意。
means: empty ： 指空无一人或一物，或空洞无意义的。
vacant ： 普通用词，侧重某物或某个位置没有被占用。
hollow ： 指物体中间是空的。
blank ： 指上面没有写字、印刷或做记号的空白表面，或指上面留着准备被填写的空白处。
open ： 指未被占有，从而可被别人得到的。

sentence.Network_en: Empty the contents of the pan into the sieve.
sentence.Network_cn: 将锅里的东西倒到筛子上。

sentence.Network_en: She showed him around the ground floor of the empty house.
sentence.Network_cn: 她带他参观了这处空房子的底楼。

sentence.Network_en: She went to the sink and ran water into her empty glass.
sentence.Network_cn: 她走到水槽边，把空玻璃杯灌上水。

means.word_mean: 空的;无人居住的;空白的;空洞的

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English ǣmtig, ǣmetig 'at leisure, unoccupied, empty', from ǣmetta 'leisure', perhaps from ā 'no, not' + mōt 'meeting' (see moot)

encyclopedia.content: empty (PHP 3, PHP 4 ) empty -- 检查一个变量是否为空 （C#） empty表示空字符串，只读 描述 bool empty ( mixed var) 如果 var 是非空或非零的值，则 empty() 返回 FALSE。换句话说，""、0、"0"、NULL、FALSE、array()、var $var; 以及没有任何属性的对象都将被认为是空的，如果 var 为空，则返回 TRUE。 除了当变量没有置值时不产生警告之外，empty() 是 (boolean) var 的反义词。参见转换为布尔值获取更

entry.def: An empty place, vehicle, or container is one that has no people or things in it.

example.ex: The room was bare and empty.

entry.tran: (威胁、关系等)空洞的，无意义的，无效的
entry.def: An empty gesture, threat, or relationship has no real value or meaning.

example.ex: His father threatened to throw him out, but he knew it was an empty threat.
example.tran: 他父亲威胁要把他赶出去，但他知道那只不过是吓吓他罢了。

example.ex: ...to ensure the event is not perceived as an empty gesture.
example.tran: 确保这一活动不被看作只是一种空洞的姿态

entry.tran: (生活或某段时间)空虚的，枯燥无味的
entry.def: If you describe a person's life or a period of time as empty, you mean that nothing interesting or valuable happens in it.

example.ex: My life was very hectic but empty before I met him.
example.tran: 在遇到他之前，我的生活非常繁忙却很空虚。

entry.def: If you feel empty, you feel unhappy and have no energy, usually because you are very tired or have just experienced something upsetting.

example.ex: I felt empty and hollow; defeated...
example.tran: 我感觉空虚无聊，充满挫败感。

example.ex: I feel so empty, my life just doesn't seem worth living any more.
example.tran: 我觉得非常空虚，生活似乎根本不值得继续下去。

entry.def: If you empty a container, or empty something out of it, you remove its contents, especially by tipping it up.

example.ex: Empty the noodles and liquid into a serving bowl...
example.tran: 把汤面倒进上菜用的碗中。

entry.def: If someone empties a room or place, or if it empties, everyone that is in it goes away.

example.ex: The stadium emptied at the end of the first day of athletics.
example.tran: 首日比赛结束后，体育场空无一人。

example.ex: ...a woman who could empty a pub full of drunks just by lifting one fist.
example.tran: 只要举起一只拳头就能把一酒吧的醉鬼全部赶跑的女人

entry.def: A river or canal that empties into a lake, river, or sea flows into it.

example.ex: The Washougal empties into the Columbia River near Portland.
example.tran: 沃舒格尔河在波特兰附近注入哥伦比亚河。

entry.def: Empties are bottles or containers which no longer have anything in them.

means.word_mean: 1. a container that has been emptied;
1. make void or empty of contents;
2. become empty or void of its content;
3. leave behind empty; move out of;

sentences.sentence: "You must vacate your office by tonight"

means.word_mean: 5. excrete or discharge from the body

sentences.sentence: "after skipped lunch the men were empty by suppertime"
"after the violent argument he felt empty"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 空的, 空洞的, 空虚的
stems_affixes.word_buile: empt拿,获得,拿走后[变空]+y→拿走后[变空]
per全部+empt拿走+ory……的→全部拿走→专横的
preempt[v.以先买权取得,取代]+ive……的→adj.优先购买的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 敏捷的, 迅速的, 即时的

stems_affixes.word_buile: exempt[adj.免除的 v.免除 n.免税者;被免除义务者]+ion动作或状态→n.免除
preempt[v.以先买权取得,取代]+ion表名词→先拿→霸占
empt拿,获得,拿走后[变空]+y→拿走后[变空]

Sentence.sentence: So why not limit the density of food outlets, particularly ones that sell food rich in empty calories?
Hotel owners found themselves with a huge number of empty rooms even as a lot of unnecessary new hotels were ready to open
The next block was almost empty.

Since luxury is a function of scarcity, the children of tomorrow will long for nothing more than intervals of freedom from all the blinking machines, streaming videos and scrolling headlines that leave them feeling empty and too full all at once.

sentences.en: The baby was sucking away at the empty feeding-bottle.
sentences.cn: 那个孩子正在吮吸着空奶瓶。

means.word_mean: 空闲的, 空虚的, 寂寥的; 无意义的; 无目的的

sentences.en: He didn't want to live an empty life.
sentences.cn: 他不想过一种空虚的生活。
蓄水池的水渐渐流空了。

sentences.en: The baby cried loudly when he emptied his bottle.
sentences.cn: 婴儿喝干了瓶子里的东西就大哭起来。

sentences.en: The room was emptied very quickly.

jushi.english: Her protest was an empty gesture, she knew it would have no effect.
jushi.chinese: 她的抗议只是做做样子,她知道那起不了什么作用。

jushi.english: The smell of her perfume lingered in the empty house.
jushi.chinese: 空屋里仍然飘溢着她的香水味。
